blogPost.excerpt: Makeena rewards consumers for buying “better,” while providing brands with real-time shopper insights. Our app captures all receipt data, as well as other engagements, while our dashboard provides brands access to that data to drive repeat purchase behavior.
blogPost.body: Makeena rewards consumers for buying “better,” while providing brands with real-time shopper insights. Our app captures all receipt data, as well as other engagements, while our dashboard provides brands access to that data to drive repeat purchase behavior.
blogPost.title: Makeena - Making better products affordable no matter where you shop.
blogPost.author: Karen Frame

localize.description: Makeena奖励购买“更好”的消费者，同时为品牌提供实时的购物者洞察力。我们的应用程序捕获所有收据数据，以及其他活动，而我们的仪表板则允许品牌访问这些数据，以推动重复购买行为。
localize.tagline: 无论你在哪里购物，都能买得起更好的产品。

localize.description: Makeena獎勵購買“更好”的消費者，同時爲品牌提供實時的購物者洞察力。我們的應用程序捕獲所有收據數據，以及其他活動，而我們的儀表板則允許品牌訪問這些數據，以推動重複購買行爲。
localize.tagline: 無論你在哪裏購物，都能買得起更好的產品。

previous.excerpt: In one tap, remove the background and compose an image that will showcase a product or a model. PhotoRoom is an image editing app that lets you capture, edit, and mix images by editing objects.
previous.title: PhotoRoom Android - Remove background & create pro photos

localize.description: 只需轻轻一点，即可移除背景并合成将展示产品或模型的图像。PhotoRoom是一款图像编辑应用程序，允许您通过编辑对象来捕获、编辑和混合图像。
localize.tagline: 删除背景并创建专业照片

localize.description: 只需輕輕一點，即可移除背景併合成將展示產品或模型的圖像。PhotoRoom是一款圖像編輯應用程序，允許您通過編輯對象來捕獲、編輯和混合圖像。
localize.tagline: 刪除背景並創建專業照片

next.excerpt: Company in a Box is a GPT-3 powered tool that creates compelling landing pages for your startup idea in seconds. Vet more ideas, focus on the ones that stick, and start collecting leads! Coming soon: deploy ads & plug in your own Typeform waitlist.
next.title: Company in a Box - Startup idea to leads in one click with GPT-3

localize.description: 盒子里的公司是一个GPT-3驱动的工具，它可以在几秒钟内为你的创业想法创建引人注目的登录页面。审查更多的想法，专注于那些坚持的想法，并开始收集线索！即将推出：部署广告并插入您自己的Typeform等待列表。
localize.tagline: 借助GPT-3，一键即可获得潜在客户的创业想法

localize.description: 盒子裏的公司是一個GPT-3驅動的工具，它可以在幾秒鐘內爲你的創業想法創建引人注目的登錄頁面。審查更多的想法，專注於那些堅持的想法，並開始收集線索！即將推出：部署廣告並插入您自己的Typeform等待列表。
localize.tagline: 藉助GPT-3，一鍵即可獲得潛在客戶的創業想法
